mapper.select: select revnum, schedulenum, usersemail, usersaddr, usersimage, revcontents , revlike, to_char(writedate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as writedate from review order by writedate desc
select revnum, schedulenum, usersemail, usersaddr, usersimage, revcontents, revlike, to_char(writedate, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') as writedate from review where revnum = #{revNum}
mapper.insert: insert into review values((select nvl(max(revnum)+1, 0) from review), 0, #{usersEmail}, #{usersAddr}, #{usersImage}, #{revContents}, #{revLike}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update review set revcontents = #{revContents}, revlike = #{revLike}, writedate = sysdate where revnum = #{revNum}
